dict.string: Machine Learning What is learning? Kinds of learning Visual Recognition Walking Talking Ride a Bike Alphabet Colors Left from Right Counting Arithmetic Reading Writing Sports Social Interactions Artistic Why are they the same? gain new knowledge and skils skils experience mistakes knowledge Concept Formation Inductive Learning Supervised/Trained Learning vs Unsupervised Unsupervised Concept formation Supervised Reading School Does a program use machine learning?
